text.section: A majority of the members then serving on the Board is a quorum.

The Board shall meet:
At least twice a year, at the times and places that it determines; and
When requested by the Secretary.

In accordance with the budget of the Board, each member of the Board is entitled to:
Compensation, at a rate determined by the Board, for each day on which the member is engaged in the duties of the member's office; and
Reimbursement for expenses at a rate determined by the Board.
The Board may employ a staff in accordance with the budget of the Board.
